thread.title: Accelya Kale Managing Director steps down
thread.title_full: Accelya Kale Managing Director steps down

author: eTN Editor
title: Accelya Kale Managing Director steps down
text:
Accelya Kale Managing Director steps down   
Aug 10, 2015 Banners   
Accelya Kale Solutions Limited announced today that its current Managing Director will step down from his current role as part of a succession plan.
